Name: Lost Snowmen
About the game: Explore an enemy planet and eliminate threats to the safety and well-being of your home world. A puzzle-platformer starring three characters with different skill sets, who will have to assist each other during their adventures in order to fulfill a variety of level objectives. Controls and switches between three different characters with unique abilities Solve puzzles and defeat enemies to complete levels The storyline will reveal through the funny dialogues of the characters
